reference.shortdesc: The steptroubleshooting element contains information that is designed to help remedy the situation when a step does not complete as expected.

section.title: Usage information
section.note: Do not use <note type="trouble"> inside of the steptroubleshooting element, because its meaning there would be ambiguous.
section.draft-comment: I don't understand how this would be ambiguous, but it does feel like it would be redundant?

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The steptroubleshooting element is specialized from div. It is defined in the task module.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample shows using the steptroubleshooting element with several actions:
example.codeblock:
Log in to the system

The Welcome screen appears.

If the Welcome screen does not appear, try one or more of the following:

  • Verify that the user name was entered correctly
  • Verify that the password was entered correctly
  • Confirm that the maintenance contract is still active
